functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.

msg.content: Who are the nominees of the 2024 Taiwanese presidential election and what are their birth dates?
Who are the nominees of the 2024 Taiwanese presidential election and what are their birth dates?

function.name: delegate
function.arguments: {"instructions":"Please look up the nominees of the 2024 Taiwanese presidential election and their birth dates."}

msg.content: You shouldn't delegate the entire task to a helper. Handle it yourself, or if it's still too complex, try breaking it up into smaller steps and call this again.

functions.name: delegate

Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.

functions.name: search
functions.desc: Search Wikipedia for an article with the given title, and get its content. If no such article is found, return similar article names.

msg.content: Please look up the nominees of the 2024 Taiwanese presidential election.

functions.name: search
functions.desc: Search Wikipedia for an article with the given title, and get its content. If no such article is found, return similar article names.

msg.content: Please look up the birth dates of the nominees of the 2024 Taiwanese presidential election.

No page with that title exists. Try searching for one of these similar articles instead:
- 2024 Taiwanese presidential election
- 2024 Taiwanese general election
- 2024 Taiwanese legislative election
- 2020 Taiwanese presidential election
- 2024 Indonesian presidential election
- Mike Pence 2024 presidential campaign
- Lai Ching-te
- Joe Biden
- 2024 Indonesian general election
- 2024 Republican Party presidential debates and forums
